snippet.title: Coldsteel Adventure 7 [RELEASE AND SPEEDRUN]
snippet.description:
Originally created for the SimpleFlips 2023 Troll Competition:

Hack uses the Mushroom Blast engine, link to my main channel if you'd like to see more updates for my upcoming major hack Sonic Mushroom Blast:

https://www.youtube.com/user/blakeoramo

Hack Download Link:
https://romhacking.com/hack/coldsteel-adventure-7

[Note, hack utilizes SD card tech from Parallel Launcher and thus Parallel Launcher is the recommended emulator to play on.]

Full engine credits will be released with the full release of Mushroom Blast.
